attributes.review: Donald stole all of my diamonds and killed all of my farm animals and then declared a fascist dictatorship within my city. He's been posting propaganda signs all over and is griefing my people, stop horrible app, wouldn't even let me sign in with a fake phone number 0/10 would never try again
attributes.title: Donald Trump was able to hack into my Minecraft server after downloading this app.

attributes.review: For some reason, this app uses pop up messages, and I am very old and have severe mental issues, which likely should limit my right to vote, but we don’t restrict elders. In any case, the pop up message gave me a shock, and my children had to come to my house and drive me to a hospital. I would sue if I could! Don’t risk it, or you could die. Anyone but trump 2020.
attributes.title: I almost died!

attributes.review: This app is terrible!! One star is a bit too generous but it’s the lowest review I can give. If it were up to me I would rate this app -4.7/16 and I wouldn’t use stars, I would use blinks. Yes blinks like what your eyes do every once in a while. I would stop blinking and deal with all the repercussions if it meant  this app would be deleted off of the App Store.
attributes.title: I’d rather stop blinking then own this app

attributes.review:
I was trying to understand his policies, his ideologies, and get content, but the app it TERRIBLE! It keeps glitching, giving me TONS of notifications, and overall is an unpleasant experience. User interface is difficult to navigate, and you have to jump through to many hoops (phone number, information etc) to get to any significant content.

Do better.
attributes.title: HORRIFIC!

attributes.review: As soon as i opened the app, i got a phone call from fbi agent frank beans telling me to delete it immediately because it was unsafe! i  then continue setting up my account against agent bean’s orders and i quickly regretted it. a whole acorn squash was thrown directly into my face through my phone! i will never open the app ever again and will be deleting!!
attributes.title: terrible app

attributes.review: my phone had been glitching ever since I got this app and now I’ve read after becoming a google expert after my searches on reddit to that I already had open to confirm my anti vax beliefs because of course I don’t believe in the liberal deep state science that this app exposes our information to China. Don’t trust. Bad news. Vote him out 2020!
attributes.title: Don’t Download China stealing our information

attributes.review:

PLEASE SEND HELP!!!!

XOXO- Barron Trump💋💔
attributes.title: I hate it here

attributes.review: you know i was really looking forward to using this app supporting a racist but honest to Ivanka, trumps hand stared coming out of the phone looking for children near me to kidnap. Being me i don’t condone that type of activity so i threw my phone to a horse girl so she and her horse could gallop in the wind with it so it couldn't kidnap children. So be careful children thats a lot racist and creepy man in one dictator...
attributes.title: Be careful chillren

attributes.review: some sort of government administration NEEDS to get this app taken down in the U.S. it’s obvious that the creators are using our information against us. it is always lagging and messing up my phone. it often makes racist, sexist, fascist, and homophobic remarks. it’s also very clear that the app shows signs of illnesses, such as dementia. all in all, this app should no longer be allowed!
attributes.title: THIS APP SHOULD BE BANNED

attributes.review: this app got me eaten by a shark. this is my ghost typing. please don’t download this app. i downloaded this app and it magically transported me to a beach. Melania was there and she grabbed a shark out of the water and opened up it’s jaws (something that she can’t do with all that botox and the NDA that she most likely signed so she doesn’t expose tf outta her husband). then, Donald came and he pushed me into the shark’s mouth. the shark was a well known trump supporter. do not download this app.
attributes.title: clowneryyyy
